duas.title: Morning Dua
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ النُّشُورُ
duas.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the Resurrection.

duas.title: Protection from Evil Eye
duas.arabic_text: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ
duas.translation: I seek refuge in Allah's perfect words from every devil, poisonous pest, and every evil eye.

duas.title: Dua Before Eating
duas.translation: In the name of Allah and with the blessings of Allah

duas.title: Dua for Traveling
duas.arabic_text: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
duas.translation: Glory to Him Who has subjected this to us, for we could never have accomplished this by ourselves, and indeed to our Lord we will return.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
duas.translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, for You are the Ever-Accepting of repentance, the Most Merciful.
